channel.title: Blog | Léo Corporation
channel.description: Recent content on Blog | Léo Corporation

item.title: About
item.description:
About us

Léo Corporation creates and maintains applications. It’s the home of our projects. Léo Corporation was created by @Leo-Peyronnet.

Our projects and applications

We maintain a few apps:

  • Passliss - A modern password generator for Windows.
  • InternetTest - A simple internet utility for Windows.
  • ColorPicker - A modern color picking tool for developers.
  • Datalya - A modern and simple database creator/manager for Windows.
  • Gavilya - A simple game launcher.

And more…

Our website

We have a website available at https://leocorporation.dev.

item.title: Datalya: Version 1.6.0.2208 is now available
item.description:
A new version of Datalya is now available, and it is the version 1.6.0.2208.

Changelog

New

  • Added “Re-order” buttons in Input Block (#75)
  • Added “Re-order” buttons in Multichoices Block (#75)
  • Added “Re-order” buttons in Selector Block (#75)
  • Added “Re-order” buttons in Single Choice Block (#75)
  • Added “Re-order” button in Date Block (#75)
  • Added the possibility to move up a Block (#75)
  • Added the possibility to move down a Block (#75)
  • Added the possibility to re-order Blocks (#75)
  • Added translations (#76)
  • Added a “Popup” menu on the “Import” button (#76)
  • Added the possibility to import existing template (#76)
  • Redesigned the “Select a template” window (#77)

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where deleting a Block is impossible
  • Fixed popup behavior (#76)

Updated

  • Updated ClosedXML
  • Updated LeoCorpLibrary

Download

Click here to download Datalya

Website

Click here to go to Datalya’s website.

Screenshot

item.title: A slight update on our look
item.description:
We have a new look!

As you may have noticed, we’ve updated our font in our logos and websites. We are announcing that we’re ditching the Montserrat font for Hauora Sans. This font gives more personality to our identity, since the old font was one of the most popular sans serif fonts used in apps, websites, and product. The new one is – indeed – like Montserrat, but it adds some small details that makes it better than the old one.

When will this change take effect?

As we said, most of our websites have already received an update. However, our apps haven’t yet. An update should roll out to them this month.

Léo Corporation is always evolving, and we would like to thank our users for taking this journey with us.

Image

item.title: LeoCorpLibrary: Version 4.4.0.2203 is now available
item.description:
A new version of LeoCorpLibrary is now available, and it is the version 4.4.0.2203.

Changelog

New

  • Added time conversions methods to UnitsConversions class (#302)

  • Added the possibility to download a file using an HttpClient (#305)
